credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Architectural Fantasy with Fountain and Obelisk
medium: Black chalk, brush and gray wash on off-white laid paper
description: A fountain, an obelisk, and a statue of a horse are shown against parts of a colonnade.  Enlarged at the bottom and at left by the artist who wrote his signature in one of th eparts surrounding the fountain. Strips of paper have been added to the top and bottom of the drawing.
name: drawing
